en.definition: An array is similar data saved on a computer system in a sequential form.

wo.definition: Béne array da fa mel na données si ordinateur system bi si sequence.

en.definition: A named section of a program that performs a specific task.

wo.definition: Béne section bu tudu turu li nga wara déf.

en.definition: The branch of mathematics dealing with the properties and manipulation of numbers.

wo.definition: Branchu kalkil bi moye li gnu may ba gnu mana changer numero yi.

en.definition: Bit is Binary Digit. It refers to a digit number, either a 0 or a 1. The binary digit is used to represent computerized data.

wo.definition: Bit bi nurmero bu binere la. Li mouye woowé numero bi mou mome, 0 walla 1. Li mouye wo moye données ordinateur.

en.definition: Eight bits is equal to 1 byte.
Internet is a network that accommodates several computers to facilitate exchange and transfer of data.

wo.definition: Web bi moy kognu ordinateurs yu berré pour ndimbalé ecahnge you données.

en.definition: Data refers to the information that is saved on a computer.

wo.definition: Donnée moy lo xamné man nga ko dentch si sa ordinateur.

en.definition: An expression, the value of which is either true or false.

wo.definition: Béne expression bo xamné man na nekk degg wala du degg.

en.definition: Hardware is a set of physical objects such as monitor, keyboard, mouse, and so on.

wo.definition: Wegn moy lo xamné da fa nekk degg lou mel na ecran, clavier ak souris ak lenéne.

en.definition: ZIP is an acronym for Zone Information Protocol. ZIP enables transfer of data using compression of files.

wo.definition: ZIP moy turu Zone Information Protocol. ZIP bi daf lay may nga mena ejul sey fichier touti lo léne.

en.definition: WWW stands for World Wide Web. It’s a term used to define the Internet.

wo.definition: WWW moy World Wide Web. Mome la gnu toudé Internet bi.
